short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates email replies using your company's knowledge base

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prophecy's Chrome extension enables Account Executives (AEs) to draft email replies effortlessly within Gmail using the company's knowledge base. With just one click, AEs can generate precise and contextual responses to customer queries without having to manually reference internal documentation or type out extensive replies. This service saves valuable time, streamlines communication, and ensures that responses are accurate and consistent across the board. By automating this process, Prophecy helps AEs focus on higher-priority tasks, all while maintaining the integrity of their customer interactions.
